krpano.action: caller.sprite.className = args[1];
caller.sprite.id = args[1];
set(layer[%2].height, %1);

layer.name: CY_Sidebar_logo

krpano.action:
$(document).ready(function(){ let result = document.querySelector("#CY_Sidebar_outputMenu") if(result != null){ let items_type1 = document.createElement('div'); items_type1.id="type1"; items_type1.innerHTML = `
` result.appendChild(items_type1) let items_type1_1 = document.createElement('div'); items_type1_1.id="type1_1"; items_type1_1.innerHTML = `
` + sidebarHtmldecode("項目一") + "
" result.appendChild(items_type1_1) let items_type1_2 = document.createElement('div'); items_type1_2.id="type1_2"; items_type1_2.innerHTML = `
` + sidebarHtmldecode("項目二") + "
" result.appendChild(items_type1_2) let items_type2 = document.createElement('div'); items_type2.id="type2"; items_type2.innerHTML = `
` result.appendChild(items_type2) let items_type2_1 = document.createElement('div'); items_type2_1.id="type2_1"; items_type2_1.innerHTML = `
` result.appendChild(items_type2_1) let items_type2_2 = document.createElement('div'); items_type2_2.id="type2_2"; items_type2_2.innerHTML = `
` result.appendChild(items_type2_2) let items_type2_3 = document.createElement('div'); items_type2_3.id="type2_3"; items_type2_3.innerHTML = `
` result.appendChild(items_type2_3) } })

$(document).ready(function(){ let result = document.querySelector('#CY_Sidebar_outputButtons'); if(result != null){ let buttons_btn_1 = document.createElement('div') buttons_btn_1.id="btn_1" buttons_btn_1.className="desktop " buttons_btn_1.onclick="" buttons_btn_1.innerHTML = `
` result.appendChild(buttons_btn_1) let buttons_btn_2 = document.createElement('div') buttons_btn_2.id="btn_2" buttons_btn_2.className="desktop " buttons_btn_2.onclick="" buttons_btn_2.innerHTML = `
` result.appendChild(buttons_btn_2) let buttons_btn_3 = document.createElement('div') buttons_btn_3.id="btn_3" buttons_btn_3.className="desktop " buttons_btn_3.onclick="" buttons_btn_3.innerHTML = `
` result.appendChild(buttons_btn_3) } });
